content: Yang Li | Department of Computer Science Skip to main content Yang Li Position Assistant Professor Yang Li is an Assistant Professor of Computer Science at Iowa State University. He received his Ph.D. and Master's degrees from Carnegie Mellon University in 2020 (advisor: Professor Jos√© M. F. Moura), a Master's degree from The University of Texas at Austin in 2013, and his Bachelor's degree from Tsinghua University in 2011. Before joining Iowa State University, he was a research scientist at Meta and a researcher at Microsoft.
